description:
Embark on a quest through the Keymaster's Keep, a mysterious castle where every door and passage hides a series of
video game chalenges, and only the right keys can unlock the path forward. Complete challenges, find keys, uncover
artifacts of resolve, and face the ultimate trial to claim victory.

keymasters-2.0.1.description:
This is mostly a bugfix release.

* Made a bunch of YAML related generation errors user-friendly
* Added `archipelago.json` manifest for 0.6.4 compatibility
* Added URL support, so you can click the link in the webhost and get straight into the client
* Added Switch 2 as a possible platform
keymasters-2.0.1.title: Keymaster's Keep 2.0.1

keymasters_keep-2.1.0.description:
* Fix shop sanity destroying low trial count settings by @wolicodes in https://github.com/silasary/Archipelago/pull/6
* Add game selection bag size options by @jack5github in https://github.com/silasary/Archipelago/pull/9
* Add Area Domination goal and Conquest Medallions by @jack5github in https://github.com/silasary/Archipelago/pull/8
* Per Game Option Groups by @silasary in https://github.com/silasary/Archipelago/pull/10

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/silasary/Archipelago/compare/keymasters_keep-2.0.1...keymasters_keep-2.1.0
keymasters_keep-2.1.0.title: Keymaster's Keep v2.1.0

keymasters_keep-2.1.1.description:
* Fixed crash when a shop contains a deprioritized item.
* Fixed crash when connecting to a world that was generated before the conquest update
keymasters_keep-2.1.1.title: Keymaster's Keep v2.1.1

keymasters_keep-2.1.2.description: Added backwards compatibility for worlds created before area_domination added.
keymasters_keep-2.1.2.title: Keymaster's Keep v2.1.2

keymasters_keep-2.1.3.description: Better error messages when generation fails.
keymasters_keep-2.1.3.title: Keymaster's Keep v2.1.3

keymasters_keep-2.1.5.description:
Added new yaml option to guarantee a game will be used at least once
Added full traceback to broken_games.txt for easier debugging
keymasters_keep-2.1.5.title: Keymaster's Keep v2.1.5

kmk-0001r2.description:
## New in this version
* **Game implementations are no longer shipped with the APWorld**. To add games to Keymaster's Keep, you will now add the Python files for the desired implementations directly in a special `keymasters_keep` directory that exists in your Archipelago installation directory
* Game Backlog and Custom are now core games
* Extra Artifacts of Resolve will now be tagged as useful instead of filler

## Keymaster's Keep
Keymaster's Keep is a dynamic, multi-game objective / challenge generator that seamlessly integrates with a thematic Archipelago randomizer. In other words, you have a typical Archipelago randomizer with goals, finite locations, progression items, logic etc. and Keymaster's Keep will generate and associate unique game challenges with each location. The APWorld features a plugin system to add games independently from releases, as well as a dedicated client to assist with the exploration and challenges of Keymaster's Keep.

**When you play Keymaster's Keep...**
* You will generate a new keep with distinct areas
* A few of these areas will be unlocked from the start
* The rest will be locked and will require combinations of magic keys to unlock
* These magic keys are scattered throughout the multiworld
* Once an area is unlocked, a set of trials for a specific game will be revealed
* For each trial you complete, you will manually check it off in the client and that will correspond to a location check
* Your goal will either be to collect enough artifacts of resolve to unlock a final challenge to beat or to escape the keep with a certain number of magic keys in hand.

You can find the Python files for the game implementations that used to be bundled with Keymaster's Keep here: https://github.com/SerpentAI/KeymastersKeepGameArchive

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/647f9272-ef00-48bd-96cc-3e27a9317d79)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5a466ef5-e23d-4703-a5a9-34d17c64da81)
kmk-0001r2.title: Keymaster's Keep - Release #1

kmk-0002.title: Keymaster's Keep - Release #2: The Shop Update

kmk-0002r2.title: Keymaster's Keep - Release #2: The Shop Update

kmk-0002r3.description:
## New in this version
* Players now have the option to define a configurable chance to replace keep areas with shops
* Each shop has a unique name and a unique shopkeeper that will greet you and incite you to shop in their own way
* Shop will have a variable number of items for sale (configurable; up to 5 per)
* Shopkeepers will only part with their valuable items in exchange for specific unique relics (New progression items!) 
* Players can configure the chance of each shop item being forced as a progression item
* An option exists to control whether or not discovering a shop will generate hints for its items

Finally, a totally insane feature (as in, literal insanity required to add this):
* Keymaster's Keep shops are Archipelago item aware and will show a unique description for each one
* For this initial release, every item from core-verified APWorlds have descriptions (over 12,000 items!)
* The game also has a pool of interesting descriptions for items it doesn't know
* Future updates will gradually add item descriptions support for popular / stable custom APWorlds

Note: Screenshots are taken from Archipelago 0.6.2 (with the new UI), but the APWorld works just fine with 0.6.1.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c49d66d0-fea6-421c-ad71-80fc1b91cf16)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bcb61f4e-b113-434c-a0e4-5bd2307fce75)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/8f41f0ca-d707-4cd5-a996-1c13c222b8c1)


## Keymaster's Keep
Keymaster's Keep is a dynamic, multi-game objective / challenge generator that seamlessly integrates with a thematic Archipelago randomizer. In other words, you have a typical Archipelago randomizer with goals, finite locations, progression items, logic etc. and Keymaster's Keep will generate and associate unique game challenges with each location. The APWorld features a plugin system to add games independently from releases, as well as a dedicated client to assist with the exploration and challenges of Keymaster's Keep.

**When you play Keymaster's Keep...**
* You will generate a new keep with distinct areas
* A few of these areas will be unlocked from the start
* The rest will be locked and will require combinations of magic keys to unlock
* These magic keys are scattered throughout the multiworld
* Once an area is unlocked, a set of trials for a specific game will be revealed
* For each trial you complete, you will manually check it off in the client and that will correspond to a location check
* Your goal will either be to collect enough artifacts of resolve to unlock a final challenge to beat or to escape the keep with a certain number of magic keys in hand.

You can find the Python files for the game implementations that used to be bundled with Keymaster's Keep here: https://github.com/SerpentAI/KeymastersKeepGameArchive

kmk-pre-0001.description:
Keymaster's Keep is a dynamic, multi-game objective / challenge generator that seamlessly integrates with a thematic Archipelago randomizer. In other words, you have a typical Archipelago randomizer with goals, finite locations, progression items, logic etc. and Keymaster's Keep will generate and associate unique game challenges with each location. The APWorld will provide increasing monolithic support for games, as well as a dedicated client to assist with the exploration and challenges of Keymaster's Keep.

**When you play Keymaster's Keep...**
* You will generate a new keep with distinct areas
* A few of these areas will be unlocked from the start
* The rest will be locked and will require combinations of magic keys to unlock
* These magic keys are scattered throughout the multiworld
* Once an area is unlocked, a set of trials for a specific game will be revealed
* For each trial you complete, you will manually check it off in the client and that will correspond to a location check
* Your goal will either be to collect enough artifacts of resolve to unlock a final challenge to beat or to escape the keep with a certain number of magic keys in hand.


_Keymaster's Keep will be in the pre-release stage until there are at least 100 games supported._

**Supported Games:**
* Archipelago Multiworld Randomizer
* Pinball FX3
* Street Fighter 6
* Trackmania

**Supported Metagames:**
* Game Backlog

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/647f9272-ef00-48bd-96cc-3e27a9317d79)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5a466ef5-e23d-4703-a5a9-34d17c64da81)
kmk-pre-0001.title: Keymaster's Keep - Pre-Release #1

kmk-pre-0003.description:
## New in this version
* **Backend**: Games classes are now automatically discovered and registered simply by existing in the games directory (Silvris)
* **Client**: Reworked display of game + available trials on Keymaster's Keep tab
* **Client**: When trials are available for an area on Keymaster's Keep tab, clicking the row takes the player to the Available Trials tab (Fuzzy)
* **Generation**: Better duplicate objective prevention within a keep area
* **Feature**: Game Medley Mode. If enabled, a percentage of keep areas will feature Game Medley as their game, with each trial sourced randomly from the pool of available games. Configurable through 2 options in the YAML file.

**Games**
* 4 new supported metagames!
* 46 new supported games! (Community effort!)
* `Archipelago Multiworld Randomizer` was moved to metagames

## Keymaster's Keep
Keymaster's Keep is a dynamic, multi-game objective / challenge generator that seamlessly integrates with a thematic Archipelago randomizer. In other words, you have a typical Archipelago randomizer with goals, finite locations, progression items, logic etc. and Keymaster's Keep will generate and associate unique game challenges with each location. The APWorld will provide increasing monolithic support for games, as well as a dedicated client to assist with the exploration and challenges of Keymaster's Keep.

**When you play Keymaster's Keep...**
* You will generate a new keep with distinct areas
* A few of these areas will be unlocked from the start
* The rest will be locked and will require combinations of magic keys to unlock
* These magic keys are scattered throughout the multiworld
* Once an area is unlocked, a set of trials for a specific game will be revealed
* For each trial you complete, you will manually check it off in the client and that will correspond to a location check
* Your goal will either be to collect enough artifacts of resolve to unlock a final challenge to beat or to escape the keep with a certain number of magic keys in hand.


_Keymaster's Keep will be in the pre-release stage until there are at least 100 games supported._

**Supported Games:**
[View Here](https://github.com/SerpentAI/Archipelago/blob/kk/worlds/keymasters_keep/Supported%20Games.md)

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/647f9272-ef00-48bd-96cc-3e27a9317d79)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5a466ef5-e23d-4703-a5a9-34d17c64da81)
kmk-pre-0003.title: Keymaster's Keep - Pre-Release #3

kmk-pre-0004.description:
## New in this version
* **Client**: Trial labels can now use a custom locally installed font through some configuration in `host.yaml` (to display special characters, Chinese/Japanese etc.)
* **Feature**: Game Medley Game Selection.  Allows the player to specify in their YAML a completely independent game pool that will be used exclusively by medleys to roll their trials (through the `game_medley_game_selection` option).
* **Options**: `include_time_consuming_objectives` now defaults to true
* **Options**: New selection group for modded games: `modded_game_selection`

**Games**
* 1 new supported metagame!
* 45 new supported games!
* 2 new supported modded games!

## Keymaster's Keep
Keymaster's Keep is a dynamic, multi-game objective / challenge generator that seamlessly integrates with a thematic Archipelago randomizer. In other words, you have a typical Archipelago randomizer with goals, finite locations, progression items, logic etc. and Keymaster's Keep will generate and associate unique game challenges with each location. The APWorld will provide increasing monolithic support for games, as well as a dedicated client to assist with the exploration and challenges of Keymaster's Keep.

* For each trial you complete, you will manually check it off in the client and that will correspond to a location check
* Your goal will either be to collect enough artifacts of resolve to unlock a final challenge to beat or to escape the keep with a certain number of magic keys in hand.


_Keymaster's Keep will be in the pre-release stage until there are at least 100 games supported._

kmk-pre-0006.description:
## New in this version
* **Major Change - Options / Generation**: `metagame_selection` and `modded_game_selection` have been removed. The games that were listed under those selections have been consolidated under `game_selection`. Platform metadata will instead be used to distinguish "special" games (new platforms were added this release for Modded Game, Board Game (Physical), Card Game (Physical)). 

**Make sure to review existing YAMLs to make sure to move your selected metagames and modded games to `game_selection` before generating your next keep!**

* **Feature - Options**: Games can now appear multiple times in `game_selection` and `game_medley_game_selection`, affecting how likely they are to get picked

**Games**
* 17 new supported games!
* 2 updated games!

## Keymaster's Keep
Keymaster's Keep is a dynamic, multi-game objective / challenge generator that seamlessly integrates with a thematic Archipelago randomizer. In other words, you have a typical Archipelago randomizer with goals, finite locations, progression items, logic etc. and Keymaster's Keep will generate and associate unique game challenges with each location. The APWorld will provide increasing monolithic support for games, as well as a dedicated client to assist with the exploration and challenges of Keymaster's Keep.

**When you play Keymaster's Keep...**
* You will generate a new keep with distinct areas
* A few of these areas will be unlocked from the start
* The rest will be locked and will require combinations of magic keys to unlock
* These magic keys are scattered throughout the multiworld
* Once an area is unlocked, a set of trials for a specific game will be revealed
* For each trial you complete, you will manually check it off in the client and that will correspond to a location check
* Your goal will either be to collect enough artifacts of resolve to unlock a final challenge to beat or to escape the keep with a certain number of magic keys in hand.


_Keymaster's Keep will be in the pre-release stage until there are enough available games and the APWorld is done with major changes._

**Supported Games:**
[View Here](https://github.com/SerpentAI/Archipelago/blob/kk/worlds/keymasters_keep/Supported%20Games.md)

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/647f9272-ef00-48bd-96cc-3e27a9317d79)
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5a466ef5-e23d-4703-a5a9-34d17c64da81)
kmk-pre-0006.title: Keymaster's Keep - Pre-Release #6

kmk-pre-0007.description:
## New in this version
* **Feature - Generation**: The duplicate protection for trials has been expanded to a broader scope: The whole keep! Now the only possible way to have duplicates is if you completely run out of possible data combinations across every trial template for every game in the selection. The behavior also expands to game medleys.

**Games**
* 18 new supported games!
* 6 updated games!

## Keymaster's Keep
Keymaster's Keep is a dynamic, multi-game objective / challenge generator that seamlessly integrates with a thematic Archipelago randomizer. In other words, you have a typical Archipelago randomizer with goals, finite locations, progression items, logic etc. and Keymaster's Keep will generate and associate unique game challenges with each location. The APWorld will provide increasing monolithic support for games, as well as a dedicated client to assist with the exploration and challenges of Keymaster's Keep.

**When you play Keymaster's Keep...**

* The rest will be locked and will require combinations of magic keys to unlock
* These magic keys are scattered throughout the multiworld

* For each trial you complete, you will manually check it off in the client and that will correspond to a location check
* Your goal will either be to collect enough artifacts of resolve to unlock a final challenge to beat or to escape the keep with a certain number of magic keys in hand.


_Keymaster's Keep will be in the pre-release stage until there are enough available games and the APWorld is done with major changes._

kmk-pre-0008.description:
## New in this version
* **Client - QoL**:  Added a Copy button to have an easy way to extract objective text from the client
* **Fix - Generation**: Honor time-consuming and difficult exclusions in game medley objective generation

**Games**
* 7 new supported games!
* 8 updated games!
